me f and my fianc m have been dating for years im very hygienic person im not perfect with it and have lazy days but love good shower and love feeling clean when lived with my parents showered every single night and would have clean bedding every other day because otherwise felt like my body was covered in germs well cut to now dont even see point in cleaning my bedding as often because as soon as my fianc gets into bed its immediately dirty its making me depressed and im seriously considering leaving but we have very young children and cant cope my own and b im agoraphobic and cant leave the house without him hes essentially my carer and he does alot for me love him so much and other than his hygiene hes pretty much perfect now my fianc grew up with an extremely abusive dad he never gets into detail and usually shuts off while we talk about it but know he made him scared of showering and brushing his teeth as result he went almost years without brushing his teeth and as you can imagine his mouth looks and smells awful his teeth are rotting and breaking off and cant kiss him without gagging hate feeling this way because he deserves to be loved but the smell of his breath makes me feel angry just cant help it ive gotten him to start brushing his teeth almost once everyday but nothing is helping the smell we have pretty strong mouthwash too but he also refuses to floss because it hurts him his teeth are very overcrowded weve spoken about him going to the dentist but its so incredibly difficult to find one in my area who is taking new patients were currently homeless so money is extremely tight and we cant afford private dentist so thats also out of the picture nothing else is getting rid of the rotting smell and everytime he yawns or speaks the whole room smells and start feeling really sick along with this he doesnt shower weve been living in hotel for the past months and hes showered once this whole time it was only because literally begged him to shower and even then he didnt wash his body with soap only water ive offered to get in the shower with him and help show him how to clean properly but he isnt comfortable with the idea now whenever ask him to shower its one excuse after the other and its very frustrating bought him deodorant too thinking maybe he could mask the smell but he hasnt used it at all its just sat in our bathroom we dont currently have washing machine but my sister lives about minutes away and does our washing for us even so he doesnt wash his own clothes he wears the same underwear for month and refuse to have sex with him evertime we have sex have really painful infection afterwards even if make sure pee straight away when we were living in our flat before it burnt down he wouldnt wear clean clothes unless washed them and layed them out for him which was really difficult for me because im physically disabled could only do one load of washing day because bending down hurt and prioritised mine and my childrens clothes the other day was playing with his hair and noticed thick yellow skin his scalp and just cant touch him anymore feel so guilty declining hugs and cuddles but just can not do it ive never really classed myself as germ freak have toddlers so im used to everything gross and strange but this was just way too far dont know what to do cant even leave him alone with the kids overnight because he wont bathe them and he wont brush their teeth or put them in pyjamas he thinks its okay that they sleep in their daytime clothes which they go to nursery in ive sat him down to speak about it all countless times and hell agree have halfarsed shower and then not shower again for another months ive asked him how can help got him new soaps and shampoos and new toothbrushes ect but he just never uses them feel like have to put up with the smell for the rest of my life and cant thought about getting my own bed but he gets really upset when even joke about it even mentioned him going to doctor or seeing therapist but he just wont do it even got him multivitamins thinking it would help but obviously he didnt even try them do have to leave is that my only option here edit it seems probably shouldve mentioned live in the uk so we do have the nhs and we are entitled to free nhs dental care the issue is every nhs dentist near me has sold out and become private and that means we have to pay an excessive amount of money for dental care ive also noticed people letting me know should also get therapy currently am and im having exposure therapy for my agoraphobia but its very long and stressful process have some days where can go out but for the most part find it very difficult was almost beaten to death by my ex boyfriend hours away from home and he hadnt been arrested due to lack of evidence ridiculous know but we move so have panic attacksevde saklanmazsam bulacağını düşünüyor nişanlım durumdan kurtaran hayatımı kurtaran kişidir

trigger warning suicide attempt dont really know where else to go to with all these feelings and my next therapy appointment is next week long story incoming sorry in advance im was raised by my mom and stepdad whos raised my since was so call him my dad my bio dad is in the picture and id visit him over the summers and some holidays etc my mom and step dad had other kids or my half siblings and we all got along very well growing up we were raised christian and would go to church every sunday bible studies during the week and my step dad would eventually become pastor knew pretty early at least age that christianity wasnt for me but id still go to church out of obligation and feign interest the outside we were definitely one of those picture perfect families that everyone would be jealous of and always tell us they wish they were apart of under the surface though was different story my mom suffers from depression as well as some form of bpd my step dad at the time wasnt diagnosed with anything but we knew he suffered from ptsd from growing up in an abusive household now no physical abuse ever happened growing up but there was definitely lot of yelling and overall tension in the house typing it out makes it sound like non issue but its truly hard to describe the feeling definitely walking egg shells vibe because youd never know what would set either of my parents off through all of this though during the good times the family got along great and can honestly say looked up to my step dad the main issues have started in the last few years pretty much since ive moved out to go to college brought my gf who met in college over for the first time and everything seemed fine they invited us to spend easter with them and were bugging the whole time talking to themselves privately they finally confronted us and asked if we were having pre marital sex we were honest and said yes to which they then politely asked us to leave as they didnt want us to be an example for my younger siblings they didnt talk to me for almost months after that we eventually reconciled but cant even remember what happened after and they cut me off again this cycle repeated for years months and good months off no contact the final straw was this past christmas my gf and agreed to visit for the holidays after we had long tearful reconciliation where everyone agreed to let the past be the past and we all move forward as family sounds amazing right the day after christmas the vibe my step dad was putting out was not it and the tension was felt by everyone he eventually asks to sit down with me and for my mom and him to talk to me big theme of what wed argue over is about the quality of our my siblings and is childhoods theyve apologized profusely about us growing up and everything and told them honestly forgive them and just want to focus our current relationship but they always came back to the guilt of raising us my mom especially would call me crying about how she divorced my bio dad and would say she did the best she could and id always reassure dont blame for anything and would thank for marrying my stepdad who stepped up and raised me as his own this convo at christmas was different though not in content but in tone it seemed now they were mad at me for not forgiving them and that the real blame should be shared with my bio dad while definitely agreed and real heart to heart with him was over due the conversation kept getting heated their end as they claimed was out to villainize them and blame them for everything which again was not the case they made it out to sound like was rebellious teenager who hated my parents and idolized the cool divorced parent if that makes sense it got so heated my gf joined the convo and started speaking up to defend me now my dad is great debater and can easily overpower conversations which hes definitely used to doing with me and the family but my girlfriend is also great at standing up for herself and not backing down she backed me up and talked back and my parents did not like that it got so bad we ended up leaving early and having to get an emergency airbnb and waiting all day at the airport the next day they banned me from talking to my siblings and said itd be best if we loved our lives separately for now this all really sucked and ill admit took it really hard and was pretty suicidal thankfully with therapy was able to work through it and am definitely in healthier mindset just heard from my sister long story but to sum it up she got kicked out for similar reasons as me we took in for few months to help feet and now shes in different state going no contact that our brother reached out to saying our dad has been in bad shape after all this and has attempted to kill himself times have lot of mixed feelings with all of this going one hand feel guilty and ulaşmak yeniden bağlantı kurmak istiyorum kardeşlerim annem yandan içinden geçtiğimiz döngüleri biliyorum please if you want to insult me for my political views just dont im looking for advice from people who can understand where im coming from dont want unnecessary hate when just want help so m and trans and have been out since sophmore year of high school dated guy back then lets call him charles and we were obviously extremely close before we even dated we were really close friends and practically did everything together he helped me while dealt with living in an abusive household when was dealing with horrible mental health episodes and him and his family actually let me move in with them to get me away from my abusive household needless to say we were ride or die for one another eventually moved across the country at to live with my dad and we kept our friendship going at distance we dont talk nearly as much life getting in the way and all but we both consider each other close friends still my other friend in this situation lets name him isaac is someone met through my current partner hes the classic goofball gives off surfer boygolden retriever energy etc hes also really great guy and over the past year of knowing him consider him one of my best friends we never did talk about political stuff but our whole friend group is more left if anything he gave the vibe of being more for independent parties so was really shocked whenever my partner came home last night in bad mood and told me they just got off the phone with isaac and informed me that he had voted for trump whats frustrating about this situation is that both of these guys are good people know them im close with them ive seen them both through their ups and downs charles didnt vote but only because he didnt renew his registration in time and has made it clear hes aware of everything trump wants to do and would have voted for him isaac the other hand is one of the people who didnt do his research and voted for trump based loosely some snippets of information he got from others and the occasional news clips you see floating around online so one friend is aware of the fact that he helped vote for someone who wants to take rights away from many minority groups and the other voted without really knowing who or what he was voting for for charles feel it best to cut him off he is very much aware of the fact that im trans he has gay friends and yet he voted for someone who has made it clear that he wants to take rights away from us feel even worse for his little sister since its rights being taken away too especially since she lives in red state just dont know how to cut him off how do you even go about cutting off such longterm friend as for isaac im justmad disappointed really didnt vote in past years because didnt feel was informed enough to vote for any candidates so sat them out cant imagine just going out to vote for someone when you dont really know all the stuff they want to do even when voted blue this year looked into all the good and bad that my candidate has done what stuff they wan na do that may disagree with etc you do your research before voting for potential president so isaac just going out to vote for someone who wants to strip away so many minorities rights just to vote he apparently didnt know that trump wanted this stuff and my partner is going to have more indepth conversation about it all with him later this week my hope is that after being more informed isaac will realize how he fucked up but im kind of scared that hell still be willing to stick to his vote never thought id lose friends over politics but its more than that everyone says that each election is the most important of our lives but this one really felt like it was have never been the political type but by god cant understand wanting to vote for someone with so much hate in their heart can understand wanting lower gas prices live in california for heavens sake but thats not worth voting for if it also means taking away peoples rights and freedom just dont know how to go about all of this and know plenty of other people are dealing with the same exact situation as me with friends family husbands children etc please what do even do here how do even bring myself to cut off people care so much about is there way to even get around this or get through something like this without breaking off the friendship for good any advice is helpful just be aware that ill be ignoring any comment that isnt actually sound advice know this discussion is super touchy but literally have nobody but my partner to talk to this about and theyre going through the same thought process am tldr two close friends of mine are trump supporters one of them knows of trumps feelings for minority groupshis plans for them but would have voted for him anyways if he had gotten his registration renewed in time the other friend didnt inform himself before the election but still voted for him im trans and eabunların seçimden etkilenen azınlık gruplarıyla çevrili kendimi uzaklaştırmak potansiyel hayatımdan çıkarmak istiyorum yapacağımı bilmiyorum

know this is long text but would really appreciate if you read all of it im really anxious it all started in was depressed for years but in because of the pandemic my depression got worse again sleeping problems lack of motivation fatigue etc when the first lockdown was over had my first real panic attack in school experienced derealization which led to the panic attack had derealization for some weeks then and even more panic attacks then after while started having intrusive thoughts at first mainly harm ocd my compulsions were always about reassurance seeking through google asking people around me etc during the derealization was also really scared of becoming psychotic even though everyone reassured me that am not since could still question it and everyone said dont have delusions im just scared because of derealization before my first derealization was bit into spirituality was in whatsapp group with people that talked about enlightenment manifestation and all that stuff dont know if ever believed all of that mean thought those spiritual concepts could be possible when had my first derealization all those spiritual topics were really triggering so stopped reading about such things in this spiritual whatsapp group were people that believed in conspiracy theories like all the illuminati nwo stuff they would send videos about it regularly then heard about mk ultra and went into deep rabbit hole of researching about it there are some people that believe that something like mk ultra still exists and that they are being controlled mind controlled read lot of whistleblower stories dont know if ever really believed those theories but definitely doubted them was also scared that maybe something like mk ultra and mind control was happening to me but it is important to say that was never convinced of that it was always just what if and that lead to researching even more questioning everything and doubting so had lot of reassurance seeking compulsions the people that believe those theories would always say that you cant trust anyone not even yourself since you are manipulated which led to me being bit suspicious but again never convinced sure had trust issues and isolated myself but still managed to talk to my therapist about it and some people and if remember correctly never said wholeheartedly believe all this but rather that it makes me scared because cant exactly disprove it all those people always said im not psychotic because still use critical thinking and question it instead of believing when my anxiety is severe sometimes experience racing thoughts and sudden racing thoughts too but also have an adhd diagnosis so it could also just be that anxiety want to get second opinion my adhd diagnosis since my new psychiatrist isnt sure about it because am also diagnosed with cptsd and she said it could also just be that in the past years didnt really think about these theories anymore whenever they came up in conversations or thought about it would still get anxious but would manage to accept the uncertainty around it and move in the past months had spike of ocd obsessions again from harm ocd to sexual ocd to existential ocd and lot of other intrusive thoughts too am officially diagnosed with ocd too and recognize that these thoughts are egodystonic even though they scare me obviously some weeks ago the fear about mk ultra theories came back and started having compulsions again to read about it got into the rabbit hole of self claimed targeted individuals who think they are mind controlled and electronically harassed and persecuted by random people those people also talk about devices that are implanted and can cause external voices and that can also implant thoughts into the brain now again dont really believe this think it is pretty likely that most of the people believing these theories are delusional and even read lots of stories from those people that later said they were psychotic the thing is there are devices in medicine that are used to alter brain states such as tms so those theories make me doubtful at times also because mk ultra is an event that actually happened in the past manipulation is very much possible the question is though if it is possible to the extend of really controlling someone which somewhat still doubt dont blindly believe those theories those self claimed targeted individuals say and most of the time would recognize that what they are saying and the way they are saying it behaving is classic for psychotic disorders try to debunk those theories these people make by researching empirical evidence for example brain devices like elon musks neurolink use critical thinking and genuinely dont wholeheartedly believe all of this it just sometimes makes me question could this be true so its also hard for me to not believe it but genuinely wouldnt say that believe it for fact its more of fear that something like that could be true read about high risk psychosis and that psychosis has early warning signs which made me really scared dont hear voices also think dont have visual hallucinations because whenever would ask people do you see that too they would reassure me that they do sometimes feel like my thinking is bit disorganized but that could also just be because of hyper awareness and being extremely anxious possible adhd as said experienced derealization in the past and sometimes still do but also never to the point where would believe that reality isnt real it just feels scary and get existential intrusive thoughts one thing that really concerns me is that my father has some history of psychotic symptoms dont really know my father since didnt grow up with him but from what my mother told me he was bit paranoid at times he also apparently took drugs last year tried to get in contact with him through social worker so didnt speak with him directly he told hes in clinic because of depression he said hes diagnosed with multiple sclerosis and that made him depressed my social worker said that the phone he seemed jumpy and his sentences were confusing and he said he cant meet up with me because my mom is stalking him im pretty sure she is not so needless to say it sounded kinda psychotic the social worker said that some medication that is given for multiple sclerosis can make one experience psychotic symptoms so maybe its just that and before it was just drugs still worry that it is genetic but what said before too is something really want to empathize people tell me lot how self aware am and repeatedly told me they dont think experience psychosis or delusions of any kind what scares me still are the disorganized thoughts have once in while racing thoughts being forgetful and struggling with concentration wanting to say something and then forgetting what wanted to say sometimes when im sleep deprived it takes bit longer for me to understand what just read but figure it out mostly sometimes but very very rarely feel like my thoughts are louder not that hear them externally or that they are actually really loud its just that when am deeply anxious focus lot stuff like that so it might just be anxiety also because have history with anxiety panic attacks potential adhd ptsd and depression read that people that fall under high risk psychosis can still have insight and notice that certain thoughts are weird and probably irrational that made me scared the most because what always helped me calm down when was scared of psychosis is that people always say people who are psychotic dont question it and have no insight the idea of psychosis is deeply terrifying to me know this post could come across as reassurance seeking and sure sometimes definitely do that but right now genuinely just want to be as rational about it as possible dont want to miss any possible symptoms so would really appreciate some thoughts that read some posts from other people with ocd who say they sometimes get paranoid thoughts though they can question them like do so question if that can be only ocd too the disorganized thoughts mostly happen when am really hyperaware and anxious when im just out and about rarely have that if even ever they also happen when am sleep deprived but not always intensely think what also scares me is that dont remember all of dont know if believed those theories just know that questioned if that happened to me but if remember correctly then was never certain that it happened to me it was always just what if found message of me that sent to an ocd specialist where also told him maybe its just my ocd messing with me but always think what if im in denial so that kinda sounds like ocd right im just not sure if back then believed those theories but then again some people do believe conspiracy theories without being delusional or mentally ill also told my therapist about it back then and dont ever remember saying she thinks im delusional there were also people who believed in those theories that said that when someone experienced mk ultra there will be code words and symbols to trigger the person to dissociate they said that triggers could be butterfly symbols chessboard symbols etc my mom had butterfly figure terrace and it made me anxious that this could be evidence of mk ultra happening to me im not sure because as said dont remember everything about but think that didnt take it as evidence it was just an oh no thats scary what if that means something currently sometimes experience some coincidences that seem kinda like what some people would call synchronicities but definitely do reflect them for example when read word and all of sudden someone says kelime bence garip büyük ihtimalle sadece aptalca tesadüf sadece m was talking to f several about years ago we first met online and we verified one another respectively by discussing and literally stocking each others social media to make sure we were legit we made similar incomes same ethnicity same religious views very similar interests and personalities however my personality type is attachment avoidant unbeknownst to our daily chats were actually making me feel uncomfortable after day of work would come home to text away with someone who still hadnt met yet this was time consuming and found myself thinking about at times more than work itself to complicate things she died hair different colors and kept hair shorter than average this lead me to believe she was lgbt or queer and indeed she is although we never discussed it did find it something to consider because what if one day she came out or decided she simply wasnt into men again never discussed this with and at the time dont think it was bothering at all but it was always something in the back of my mind after several weeksmonths of chatting the daily we both felt it was right to meet one another in person keep in mind that we were both in our younger s both young professionals just out of college seeking to settle down and become the adults we were expected to become both with very limitedno dating experience to that point as we were both dedicated academics by our standards we had found the perfect match that met all of our preferences and that we would settle down with in deciding when and where to meet she expressed to me that she drove company car ev and couldnt go beyond certain distance the other hand didnt have that limitation so we agreed that would drive to meet however when planning our first meetup she decided that meet during lunch weekday for about minutes as our first meetupdate this bothered me for reasons after talking for weeksmonths that was the best she could do give me lunch break was thinking more to the tune of half day or even the better part of saturday did take this to be red flag at the moment as simply wanted to spend part of day at least with going fun date of sorts from my end this made sense given how would have met dressed up in my best clothes driving over hour away to meet day was supposed to be at work this leads me to my next point found the idea of meeting with to be overwhelming had to buy new outfit drive over hour away take time off from work all for what someone who was having doubts about and who felt was either mistreating me not valuing my time or both and someone who was not sure would marry for me at least marriage is the end goal of relationship in hindsight wonder whether she was truly mistreating me or if it was all in my head also had suspicion that she was simply using me to gain citizenship to the us as many people do this and wasnt sure if she was us citizen thats very specificrandom thing to ask when first talking to someone so never got around to asking which later found to be not true as she was us citizen nonetheless the day before our planned meetup blocked the platform we were chatting the moment blocked felt sense of relief was no longer focusing someone interfering with my jobcareer was able to focus myself and focus my attention my work while at work not within about day received an email from not sure how she found it but she did stating that she was wondering why we were no longer connected that she apologized if she did not meet my expectations and that had no need to explain anything to this made me block even further and in the moment was thinking good riddance as the time went began talking to other people began to see how terrible other people were to me and as got older started to see the younger generation become the age once was early s began to notice how the values and cultural capital ie tastes music fashion norms etc of the younger generation was different than my own repelling me from even considering dating people of the generation younger than myself also found how difficultrare it was to find someone who was so closely aligned with myself as she f was about years ago began to feel deep sense of regret of what happened between myself and f decided to search up social media and it appears that shes in the exact same situation as before working the same job same living situation although she has traveled to more places than before good because know she loved to travel and this was something we bonded over when we would chat and she recently won an award for being queer not sure if she always knew she was
